segments.text: I'm sorry to tell you that I have to cancel our appointment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must meet someone at the airport tomorrow afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . May we meet the day after tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll be free from nine to eleven . I'll be there waiting for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll discuss the contract in detail .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I'm really sorry for the trouble I've made .
segments.speaker: S1
